rules_text:
Choose one or both –
• Put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
• Untap a land you control. It becomes a 4/4 green Skeleton Giant with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.
flavor_text: [i]Silfidiae participates in very little outside matters. His garden, on the other hand, has no such issues.[/i]
